content.text: I'm a vet student. I love math and science and I'm excited to work with animals!
That's awesome! I love animals too. My cats are my family. I work at McDonald's and I found out my coworker was stealing money from the company.
Wow, that's terrible! I'm glad you found out and were able to stop them.
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I love skiing, and I'm always looking for new places to go. I also enjoy spending time with my family and friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to ski too. I'm a bit of a loner, so I usually go skiing on my own.
I'm glad to hear that you have a good time skiing! I'm looking forward to going on a ski trip with my friends soon.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm sure you'll have a great time.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it.
